UPDATE `shiji_item` SET
`item_url` = #{set.item_url},
`nick` = #{set.nick},
`num_iid` = #{set.num_iid},

`create_time` = #{set.create_time},

`search_kw` = #{set.search_kw},
`tb_from` = #{set.tb_from},
`id` in

and
